sources.title: Undercover Girl (1950)
sources.description: Alexis Smith, Scott Brady, Gerald Mohr

metadata.Plot: A New York City police woman, Christine Miller (Alexis Smith) goes undercover, posing as Sal Willis, to investigate her father's murder, and wrangles her way into the confidence of Doc Holmes (Edmon Ryan) whose office is a front for a dope ring.
metadata.Writer: Harry Essex, Robert Hardy Andrews, Francis Rosenwald
metadata.Actors: Alexis Smith, Scott Brady, Richard Egan
